title: Lamp Shade, ca. 1935
medium:
lamp shade: glass
b/c components are brass.
description: a) Elongated bowl with rounded bottom made of amber glass with bbubbles, opening of bowl fits onto  round brass plate with light bulb holder, when it is held by four screws. b) The plate is suspended by articulated metal sheathing which covers wiring, from c) a smaller circular brass plate which fits against ceiling.

tombstone.epitaph:
Lamp Shade, ca. 1935.lamp shade: glass
b/c components are brass.. 1965-57-1-a/c.
